lines.text: A man's looks have nothing to do with his success as a lover.

[learning Russian]
Honestly, I don't want to talk about red pencils with Essenin. I want to talk to him about making love with me. Now, how do say in Russian, "I adore you. You have beautiful thighs"?
I'm not after my fortune. I'm after my destiny.

[about America]
You were once wild here. Don't let them tame you.
I wouldn't say that. I'm comfortably off.
